item.title: SeriLog setting's tips 2022
item.author: Lou Chang
item.description: Installation Use NuGet to search for and install the Serilog.AspNetCore package Add configuration in Program.cs 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Log.Logger = new LoggerConfiguration() .MinimumLevel.Override("Microsoft", LogEventLevel.Warning) .MinimumLevel.Override("System", LogEventLevel.Warning)//Use MinimumLevel to set the LogLevel. If the source is from Microsoft or system messages, then the LogLevel is set to Warning .WriteTo.Console(new RenderedCompactJsonFormatter()) .WriteTo.File(new CompactJsonFormatter().ToString())//Output templates, output to Console and File .Enrich.FromLogContext() .CreateLogger(); CompactJsonFormatter will preserve message templates, properties, and formatting information so that rendered messages can be created later.
